circular_dependency_example/person"

	"Bob":   {"Bob", 30, "Fluffy"},
	"Julia": {"Julia", 40, "Rex"},
}

```go

circular_dependency_example/pet"

	"Rex":    {"Rex", "Dog", "Julia"},
}
```
